params.font: Font to check if source data exists for.
Font to store source data for.
Font to return source data for.

hasSource((uint256,string)).notice: Checks if source data has been stored for font.

setSource((uint256,string),bytes).notice: Stores source data for a font.

supportsCodePoint(bytes3).notice: Check if typeface includes a glyph for a specific character code point.
